product_name: Eagle Creek Marta Tote Bag - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Take the Eagle Creek Marta Tote with you anywhere and everywhere to keep you on track. It features smart interior organization and a back slip panel so it can stack on your wheeled luggage. Travel-focused interior organization includes mobile phone pocket, electronics pockets, zip pocket and pen slots; magnetic closure on main pocket. Front slip pocket lets you quickly stash and grab items; back slip panel lets you securely stack the tote on the handle of your wheeled luggage. Eagle Creek Marta Tote has metal findings, silky nylon satin lining, webbing shoulder straps and reflective accents. Closeout.
short_description: Take the Eagle Creek Marta Tote with you anywhere and everywhere to keep you on track. It features smart interior organization and a back slip panel so it can stack on your wheeled luggage.
